name: Mia and Me: Magic Friends
description: Take your unicorn for a ride through enchanting tracks. Discover the Rainbow Island, Crystal Cave, Heart Valley, Blackwood Forest, and many more magical locations. Help Mia, Yuko and Mo protect Centopia - take on exciting quests, search for magical items, and then, with the help of Phuddle, banish Gargona and the other villains! And then there's the cute little ponycorns you're sure to fall in love with too!

name: Fool's Pub
description:
Welcome to Fool’s Pub - The Online Multiplayer Card Game.

This isn’t just a card game – it’s an online multiplayer battle where up to four players compete in a high-stakes game of skill, luck, and survival. Outplay your friends or strangers from around the world and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last one standing.

- First-Person Fun: Experience the game through the eyes of your character, bringing you closer to the action with every draw, bluff, and shot fired.
- Play Your Way: Jump online to challenge others or enjoy offline mode with clever AI opponents when you’re flying solo.
- Cute and Dangerous: Meet adorable characters packing serious heat – their charm hides a fierce determination to win at any cost.
- Rough Rules, Wild Rounds: With Russian roulette-style mechanics, every turn could spell glory or disaster. Will you take the risk or play it safe?
- Only One Wins: In this pub, there’s no second place. Outwit, outplay, and outlast everyone else to claim the ultimate victory.

Get ready for the perfect mix of strategy, adrenaline, and chaos.
Fool’s Pub is calling – are you brave enough to answer?

name: Lost Footage: Sound In The Silence
description: Sound in the Silence is a horror game where you must find and destroy 10 Totems in a quiet, ominous environment. With each Totem destroyed, more monsters appear and eerie sounds increase, raising the tension. Survive the growing fear and complete your mission before it's too late.

name: Legends BMX
description: Pure Flow and Adrenaline! LEGENDS BMX is an energetic and exhilarating game made for extreme sports enthusiasts! Ride your BMX through a variety of parks and scenarios designed to let you pull off incredible tricks.

name: Anime Dance-Off: Around the World

description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Christmas" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

The game is developed using the UE5 engine, using various technologies such as physical rasterization and ray tracing rendering, dynamic shadow options, screen space and true 3D reflection.

name: The Adventures of Zomboy

It was developed by the original team of the "Naruto Mobile" under the studio, and received the support of Bandai Namco. The art style is delicate and highly restored. At the same time, combined with the research and development of Unreal Engine 4, the visual effect of the game's fighting blow is enhanced, and the fineness of the picture is further improved, so that players can also experience the sailing journey in the original animation.

name: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy - Expansion DLC

- Many Additions to the Main Story and Side Events

Choose between 4 classes and 8 subclasses, explore hundreds of locations, thousands of quests, dive into varied PvE and PvP modes, enter the unique vibrant world, and trade with other players. Play, explore, fight and be victorious!

name: Alien: Rogue Incursion

name: LingerieS
description: The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is asked by his twin sister, Riko, to dress up as a woman and work as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, in her place. Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie and develops a bond with the women who visit the store...

name: Fallacy Quiz

name: JR East Train Simulator: Tokaido Freight Line (Nebukawa to Tokyo, Shinjuku) E257-2000, 5500 Series
description:
Tōkaidō Freight Line is the common name for tracks on the Tōkaidō Main Line dedicated to freight trains that are separated from passenger trains (freight lines) and branch lines attached to the main line that are mainly used by freight trains (freight branch lines).

Generally, it refers to a series of freight lines and freight branch lines from Hamamatsuchō Station to Odawara Station.

The Tōkaidō Freight Line runs a variety of freight trains to and from the Kansai, Kyūshū regions, some limited express “Shōnan” trains during morning and evening hours, and test runs of new trains and crew training during daytime hours. The trains run alongside passenger lines, pass through long tunnels and elevated shelters through residential areas, and pass through a number of freight stations, allowing to enjoy the unique view of the freight line.

In this DLC, you can drive from Odawara Station to Tōkyō Station via the Tōkaidō Freight Line and Hinkaku Line (Yokosuka Line), which are separate routes from passenger lines, and to Shinjyuku Station via the Yamanote Freight Line.

We hope you will enjoy the different scenery from the passenger line.

description:
Prepare for fast, heart-pounding action and brutal competition in this multiplayer battle royale game. Play with friends (or enemies) online and see if you have what it takes to outlast and defeat the other Players in each twisted Contest.

With deadly challenges you'll recognize from "Squid Game," the series, and more new games inspired by classic childhood activities, each round is a dark trip down memory lane. Can you make it through playtime alive?

name: Warno: Northag
description: Warno: Northag brings World War III to the North German Plains, where the attacking Warsaw Pact needs to overcome NATO’s NORTHAG. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations as you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Belgium, the Netherlands, and Poland.

name: Flint: Treasure of Oblivion
description: Experience the golden age of piracy through a strong and original narrative, real-time exploration and turn-based tactical combat in Flint - Treasure of Oblivion.

name: Pro Football
description: Relive the thrill of football management with "PC Football Classic"! Inspired by the classic football managers from 90's, this title invites you to dive into the exciting world of football. A masterpiece of strategy and sports management that challenges your ability to lead your team to glory.

name: Unheim
description: UNHEIM is a psychological horror surveillance game of exceptional difficulty in which you must not only report anomalies, but also learn to survive paranormal attacks. Every night is a fight for survival against lurking horrors.

name: Birds Organized Neatly
description: In this 2D puzzle game, you have the responsibility to arrange your avian friends in a way that fits the grid. Birds Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of birds in all shapes and sizes.

name: Penny Blood: Hellbound
description: Unleash the hounds from hell and fight your way free of this otherworldly prison in a roguelike adventure that explores the world of Penny Blood’s darker side! Can you find the distinction between good and evil…?

name: A Twisted Path To Renown
description:
A Twisted Path To Renown: is a Multiplayer, loot-focused, PvEvP extraction shooter, set in the rugged 1899 United States!
Strap on your holster, assemble a posse, and get ready for a rootin'-tooting good time!
Roam the savage lands of the United States during the 1890s and live out your Western dream!
Fight against vicious bandits, or become one yourself as you loot and pillage from the Hills of Tennessee to the Pine forests of Arizona. Fight various factions in an unforgiving land for fame, and fortune!
Stay alert for ferocious wild boars, and bandits who will tan your hide for a chance to steal your precious loot!
Evade the resourceful and cunning Indigenous Peoples of early America to fight another day or attack against all odds for your chance at Legend!

name: Shadows Labyrinth
description: Embark on a journey through the enigmatic realm of shadows, battling countless creatures to unveil the path towards emancipation.

name: RowBot Rally
description: Team up with a mechanical pal and row for the gold in the annual Fish Bowl!

name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable
description: Fight for your life against man-eating Titans in Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable. In a thrilling mix of hunting and action, join the Scout Regiment and put on your Omni Directional Mobility Gear to defend and protect humanity against the Titans.

name: CargoSpace
description: Deliver packages in a world torn by goddesses. Working for Cargon they guarantee your package will arrive no matter what hazards!

name: Open Wheel Manager 2
description: Open Wheel Manager 2 - is a management sim for open wheel racing fans who want to venture back to 90s and go wheel to wheel with competitive teams.

name: Dragonyhm
description:
Experience an epic tale set in a vivid fantasy world.

For a number of years after the age-old conflict with dragons came to a head, the people of Archend have enjoyed an era of peace.

All was well until the esteemed Yhmszindr, Kurtis, went missing, and the sealed dragons began to awaken.

​Explore, solve, and battle your way through this heroic adventure, meeting memorable characters while uncovering the rich history of the land of Archend.

Step into this world as Kris, son of the Yhmszindr, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, put a stop to the plot that threatens the kingdom!​

name: Aurelia: Special Edition
description: Aurelia is set in a fantastic medieval world full of beautiful women and exotic races. The player will take the role of a young man that inherits his grandfathers house and on a sudden twist of fate becomes entangled with a magician.

name: Reknum: Fantasy of Dreams
description: Reknum: Fantasy of Dreams is a 2.5D adventure and exploration game that combines action and the magic of dreams. Join Cheri on her epic quest to uncover the secrets of a dream world filled with strange creatures, puzzles, and surreal landscapes. With hand-drawn frame-by-frame graphics and an instrumental soundtrack that captures the essence of a dream, every step of this journey is a work of art.

name: Aurelia
description: Aurelia is an game set in a magic-filled medieval world. Play as a young man that becomes fatefully entangled with a mysterious magician. Explore the land, bedding exotic beauties along the way!

name: Fishing the Abyss
description: This is a relaxing atmospheric game where you simply watch a robot catch creatures. Place it at the edge of your screen like a vertical desktop accessory and observe the ecosystem. It’s neither an idle game with mountains of stats nor an exciting fishing game.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Union of Land & Sea
description: Prepare for epic battles on both the ground and seas with content from World of Tanks Modern Armor and World of Warships: Legends, including a Premium tank and Premium ship!

name: World of Warships: Legends - United Force
description: Join forces on land and at sea with this bundle for both World of Warships: Legends and World of Tanks Modern Armor! It includes a Premium ship, a Premium tank, and more useful items.

name: Gold Mining Simulator + Mini Machines DLC
description:
DOUBLE PACK set includes realistic gold mining simulator GOLD MINING SIMULATOR and MINI MINING MACHNIES DLC:
Fulfill your dream, become the best and richest gold miner!

name: Enlisted: "Firestorm" Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- M26 T99 Squad
- Type 5 Ho-Ri Prototype Squad

name: War Thunder: Two Fronts Bundle
The Jackbox Naughty and Nice Bundle
description: The Jackbox Naughty and Nice Bundle includes 4 party games to appeal to your group’s sweet and scandalous sensibilities! Perfect for get-togethers with family or friends!

name: Tummy Bonbons: The Sweet Monster
description: Eat candy. Get spookier. Scare children into giving you their candy. Eat it. Choose new bellies. Then eat more candy, as much as you can!

name: A Dual Ascent
description:
"Once upon a time, there was a mountain; a mountain so tall, it touched the sky. It was the Great Mountain of Wonders.

An Old Pilgrim, who came from a land far away, was on his way to the summit.

But a fallen Little Star had the exact same idea, for she thought she might return home, if she reached the top of the Mountain..."

name: Stalker Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Debug Deadline
description: The main character is hired as a debugger at the game company “Dokidoki Games”! With a time limit of one week, will he be able to find the bug safely? The debugging work with fate on the line begins now!

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Seven Symphonies
description: From the creator of "Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0" comes another ROM hack which will continue the events of both Special Episode 0 and Explorers' late postgame! This time, the plot will unfold throughout the legendary Destiny Tower, which will have a drastically different nature to the one we already knew in several PMD titles.

name: Big Blind
description: Where Sound Becomes Sight, Style Meets Violence. Step into the world of darkness as a blind protagonist who sees through sound in this stylish 2D top-down shooter where every kill matters and style is everything.

name: Gift Collector
description: Gift Collector is a New Year's horror game from the first person, in the Japanese style and genre of walking simulator. Collect gifts and make the kids happy on New Year's Eve. But don't forget that Midnight is a time of miracles!

name: Lonely Christmas
description:
Lonely Christmas is an indie horror walking simulator from the first person. Feel the festive atmosphere during the day and the scary atmosphere of loneliness at night.

Feel the Christmas atmosphere! The house is located in a beautiful place among a centuries-old forest. Kevin was left there alone as his parents had gone to the shop and left him a lot of tasks to prepare for the holiday.

In the evening, Kevin hears on the radio that a crazy robber has escaped from the convoy and that he may be near his house. You have to keep the robber out of the house, call the police and wait for your parents. Good luck.

name: Infernal Legions
description: Infernal Legions is a single map in MBF21 format that reimagines Alien Vendetta map 25: Demonic Hordes.

name: Purgatory
description: A 34 Level Megawad Inspired by PSX Doom & Doom 64 with heavy influence from Doom 3 & Quake

name: Nitrogen Narcosis
description: Nitrogen Narcosis is a thalassophobes deep diving nightmare, set in sinking and sunk abandoned facilities. You and up to 7 other employees wearing the cheapest deep-dive suit money can buy are sent in to recover old materials from these facilities and return it to your captains submarine!

name: Caustic Industry
description: DBP69: Caustic Industry is a new limit-removing (cl2) megawad designed for Doom 2, with maps made by the Doomer Boards over the course of two months, led by @BiZ. The project theme was 'Industrial facilities made of rusted metal and concrete, rivers of neon nukage, and hazardous crushers.'

name: Saloon King
description: A short, cinematic western shooter with wild, fast-paced spray 'n' pray action! Help a sharp-shootin' renegade on a mission to take over the saloon. Shoot first, ask questions never. Clear out anyone daring enough to stand in your way!

name: Storage Anomaly
description: Storage Anomaly is a memory and puzzle game in which you have to identify anomalies in a dark and spooky storage room using your phone, while overcoming unexpected challenges.

name: InKing
description: Inking is a fast-paced 2D top-down action game. Players take on the role of an ink bottle warrior on a journey to become the king of tools. Use your fast attacks, moves, and powerful skills to defeat the tools that stand in your way, prove that ink and pen are the best tools, and become the King of Tools.

name: Balantica
description: Safely guide the twins to the altar. The path to the altar branches into multiple routes, each filled with trials and unexpected events awaiting the twins. As their companion, you will choose their path, build a deck of cards to give hope and overcome increasingly challenging trials.

name: Dr. Cog
description: Dr. Cog is a deck-building roguelike game using gears. Operate the memory restoration machine, turn gears, discover and enhance them, and build synergies. Complete the memory restoration within the time limit, recover the client's lost memories, and reach the final chapter.

name: Bone to Gather
description: "Bone To Gather" is a synergy-building action roguelike. Embark on an epic journey with a team of puny skeletons determined to revenge the Demon King. Recruit skeletons with unique synergies to create a powerful team and battle through monsters on your way to the final showdown.

name: Enscroll
description: Fresh out of Magic Academy with a hefty student loan, you must craft and sell magic scrolls to pay off your debt. Create spells for demanding customers and manage your growing loan payments. Will your magical skills be enough to free you from student debt?

name: Cazzarion: UFO Kidnapping
description: Sin descripción

name: Crab Game 2
description: Crab Game 2 is a multiplayer PvP game with up to 30 players where you have to survive different mini games to be the last one standing.

name: Dino-Ducks Dash
description:
Dino-Ducks Dash is a 2D Hi-Score Multiplayer Runner with PvP and Co-Op or you can even play it as a single player to beat the leaderboard.

It has a couch co-op mode and an online co-op mode, but you can also beat the stuffing out of the other cute Dino Ducks with a machete!

name: Pic-Me!
description: Test how well you know your fellow players and how creative you can be! In this turn-based card game, the goal is to find the perfect word to describe one of the images on your cards—not too easy, but not too difficult either. If your description isn't good enough, your opponents will have a chance to steal points with a better-fitting card. But if your description is too obvious, everyone scores points—except you! Only those who strike the perfect balance have a chance to win!

name: Awaria
description: Welcome to the tunnel maintenance crew. If the generators fail, it's your job to fix them. Check what's wrong, craft all the needed parts and deliver them. It's simple. Just stay clear of anything that randomly cracks bolts of electricity, spews fire, throws sharp pieces of scrap at high-velocity or radiates with ominous green light.

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange in the Whimsical Library
description: The Capybaras with Orange are back! Find them all in the fantastic library. Search for them between books and on the stained glass windows. Light them up at night with amazing colors.

name: Submarine Survivor
description: Dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures, and collect their experience crystals. Upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips.

name: Death Moon
description: DEATH MOON is a murder mystery death game visual novel inspired by games like Danganropa. However, ironically, in this "death game", death itself is not permanent. Every time you die, you open your eyes at the start of the loop forever trapped in an endless game of death and misery.

name: Lullaby Data
description: Follow the story of Lullaby and Echo in a futuristic world. Mixing action and adventure, meet many unusual characters, play numerous mini games, and explore space to discover the secrets of Lullaby and the mad gods.

name: Miglorn
description: Gather resources and strategically build up your Viking settlement by day, fortifying it to withstand the relentless onslaught of skeletons by night

name: Shenaniganza
description: Outsmart friends in goofy hide-and-seek with crazy power-ups, vibrant cartoon aesthetics, and endless laughter. Form alliances, betray buddies, and experience multiplayer mayhem in this unpredictable, entertaining game. Get ready for a bonanza of fun – where laughs never stop!

name: Micron Defense Force
description: A Roguelike Tower Defense in space with missions to conquer. Can you hold against the spreading alien bosses? Build and upgrade towers against the corruption. Choose your technologies and warpspeed your way to victory.

name: Idle Colony
description: A condensed incremental experience, where you build a colony to collect and merge bigger and bigger fruits. Combine game-changing technologies and special upgrades to find the best synergies and take your cash flow to another dimension.

name: Teachers Secrets
description: In "Teacher's Secret" you become a young student who accidentally discovers that teachers hide deeply hidden secrets and romances.

name: Berkeley's Maid: Remake Edition
description: The ghosts of the past, recounting the tragic past

name: Bunches For Bart!
description: After a particularly hefty loss in the local Casino, Bart, the Bleeding Heart Monkey, must make his way towards his new fortune -- a fountain full of banana bunches! Located at... the top of the tallest mountain in Africa?

name: The Ape Tales: An Epic Adventure Game
description: Experience an epic 2D adventure game by becoming the legendary ape who is the last hope for innocent animals. Traverse through diverse realms and eras, encountering evil that threatens your species. Prepare for the unexpected as each location unveils unique enemies and challenges that you will face.

name: Dungeons and Ducklings
description: Dungeons and Ducklings is a Retro - PacMan - Roguelite Adventure. Help Mama Duck rescue her ducklings from the evil Lich by navigating his dark dungeon. Use powerful attacks to create your own path through the Lich's maze.

name: Green Hell VR: Co-op Mode
description: Gather your team, ready your tools, and work together in order to survive a hostile and unforgiving jungle when the mode launches in 2024.

name: Asteroid King
description: Fast pace shooter that mainly focuses on Fun Factor, game mechanics and AWESOME FACTOR! The game is a blast from the past with updated features. If you are looking for a game with great mechanics and cool factor, you have found it!

name: On Your Tail
description: Embark on an intriguing seaside getaway you’ll never forget in On Your Tail, a sleuthy story-driven 3D life sim of relaxation, investigation, and knowing how to play your cards right.

name: Brood Ma: Dadda
description: Manipulate the limbs of a fragile automaton to shape an immense dynamic noise score.

name: Neko Odyssey
description: Here’s a slightly unusual Casual Adventure game where the main gameplay centers around taking pictures of cats. The pixel art graphics in a 3D setting create a charming atmosphere reminiscent of Japanese animation.

name: The Static
description: Tune into The Static, a 3D-platformer with a twist. Float, fly, bounce and surf the channels in the mysterious static-soaked universe behind the television screen. Challenge creepy creatures, solve puzzles and overcome elaborate platforming challenges with your ghostly companion.

name: Builder Simulator VR
description: In Builder Simulator VR, you will take on the role of a real builder and feel as if you are standing on a construction site. Design, create, and complete your project. Plan every detail and see your construction from different perspectives. Use a variety of materials and tools.

name: Coffee Shop Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to run a coffee shop? Now you can start your coffee shop in the beautiful city of New York. As an entrepreneur buy your coffee shop, renovate it, and sell coffee.

name: Long Live Caesar
description: 44 BC. Caesar, dictaror of Rome, finds out that the threat of conspiracy comes from the people closest to him. Can you resist the impending danger and rewrite history?

name: Cafe Paris
description: Welcome to a game about coffee and conversation. This is a 3D narrative coffee shop sim located in the heart of Paris. You run a 24/7 open coffee shop between the foot of the Eiffel Tower & the banks of the Seine river. Serve coffee & food to your customers and learn about their stories.

name: Dino Running from a Furry: Gamesforfarm
description: Run, Dino, run! You can't fall into the clutches of Mr. Furry

name: City Noodle Shop Simulator
description: This is a simulation game about the operation of a Chinese noodle restaurant. You will play the role of the owner of the noodle restaurant and develop a reasonable cost control strategy for the store, ultimately achieving profitability and development for the store

name: Mini Crawler
description: Sin descripción

name: The Noexistencen of You and Me
description: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: We Three Gifts
description: We Three Gifts is a single MBF21 map for Doom 2 (MAP01) made by Dreadopp and Lord_ Z utilizing the 32in24-15 texture pack and some of Doom Christmas: Enhanced's resources.

name: Mima's Magical Wardrobe
description: Help Mima get ready for a hot date. Or maybe it's for a job interview? Maybe it's for protesting on the streets. Who knows?

name: 100 Korea Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Korea Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: Ihin
description: Sin descripción

name: Eco Ronin
description: Grapple, jetpack, shoot, and slash through procedural worlds. Collect philosophy pages, craft items, and go to space. A precision-platformer and action-roguelike made in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Undercover
description: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?

name: Just Squat
description: Just Squat is a shmup and visual Nobel game that focuses on boss fight by growing up a boy. Grow the boy by encountering various events at the gym and school, and push Babel out with all your might! The difficulty of boss fight and the boy's growth will be determined by the exercise you choose!

name: Intergalactic Storage Clearance
description: In this light-hearted adventure, you must outwit competitors in bidding wars to secure storage containers scattered across alien worlds. The objective is to uncover valuable objects hidden within them and turn a profit by selling them on the intergalactic market.

name: 100 Korea Cats
description: 100 Korea Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Korean themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Korean places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Novice Dungeon Master
description: [Novice Dungeon Master] is a dungeon management simulation set in a fantasy world of dungeons and adventures. Turn your beginner dungeon into the ultimate dungeon of your dreams. Greet adventurers who come to visit your dungeon, grow herbs, summon monsters, and more!

name: Wonderland: The Visualized Girl
description: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: Simply Rotate
description: Simply rotate is a minimalist physics puzzle game where you rotate a level to get a ball to reach the goal while saving up on rotation for future stages. Learn the new mechanics introduced in every level and master conserving rotation between levels to reach the goal.

name: Cufflinks & Cages
description: You've been locked in Chastity by your cruel boss, will you submit to her sadistic whims, or let the company find our your secret in this Futa-on-futa chastity focused Visual Novel!

name: Mighty Marbles
description: Get ready for a thrilling challenge that will test your skills and wits. Guide lively marbles through mesmerizing mazes, manipulating virtual buttons, levers, and even gravity itself. Conquer sixty levels across four stunning worlds.

name: Anime City
description: Anime City reinvents classic visual novel mechanics by transferring them into full 3D environment. Study at anime high school, engage in after school clubs, and attempt to win love of one of your classmates.

name: Outbreak: Urban Jungle Collection
description: Hundreds of hours of undead adventures await in this collection spanning ten years of the Outbreak series!

name: The Fallow City
description: Shoot Zombies with different Strength and Weakness, do Simple Crafts and Upgrades, Fight Monsters, Solve Puzzles, get Haunted by Creepy Creatures and Experience the Story in this Indie Horror, Action-Adventure, Story game.

name: Farm
description: Chaos has taken over the pasture! Take on this addictive challenge where you need to help the farm animals find their pairs and escape the pen. Move cows, piglets, sheep, and more, organising them to free up space and ensure everyone gets out happy.

name: Fading Star Melody
description: Animation System Visual Novel "Fading Star Melody"

name: Meet Santa
description:
Did you ever want to meet Santa? Well, now you can! At least if you can win a match of Nutcracker Run!
Sir Creakwood is ready to take on any opponent—do you have the skill (or luck) to beat him? Roll your way to victory and burn this old wooden creature... for real... please, do it, this thing creeps me out! Who the hell designed these things?!

name: Cavalry Charge
description: Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms is a game that combines the historical theme of the Three Kingdoms with strategic elements. The game features a connected large-scale map design, supporting national wars with up to ten thousand players on the same map.

name: Combat The Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal Balls
description: ROLL INTO ACTION!

name: 2000s Rock Legends: Music Pack
description: Get ready to rock with the '2000s Rock Legends' DLC for Smash Drums! Featuring iconic banger tunes from a decade of musical revolution, this pack brings you 5 of the most celebrated hits that defined the rock scene of the early millennium. Immerse yourself in the beats that fueled legendary festivals and iconic rock moments. Don't miss out on this blast from the past—turn up the volume and let the nostalgia kick in!

name: The Underworld of Brain Damage
description: Players can't attack. Players need to avoid attacks in the game and lead monsters' attacks to other monsters. Let the monster kill himself! ! ! The game map is random, the elements in the map are random, and there are many strange props, so that players have different game experiences every time.

name: Crazy Shipping
description: Crazy Shipping is a free-to-play space trading and logistics management game. Players run a transportation company using ships piloted by cats, delivering cargo and passengers between stations across the solar system. The game features a risk-reward system where players balance legitimate deliveries against more profitable but risky "hot" cargo, while managing station alert levels and random events. Progress is made by expanding your fleet, purchasing stations, and upgrading facilities using currency earned through gameplay and optional in-game purchases.

name: ConsTance
description: ConsTance is a puzzle game where you have to solve different puzzles in order to discover the secret of the game.

name: Compactory
description: Team up with your friends in a small space to produce as many resources as you can!

name: The Guardian Shift
description: The Guardian Shift is a whimsical adventure about a young guardian, awakened from slumber, who faces a series of perilous trials to fulfill their destiny of safeguarding the planet. Despite the daunting challenges, the guardian must rise to the occasion and protect the world. Go forth, Guardian.

name: Traumatarium: Penitent
description:
A dungeon crawler inspired by the Fighting Fantasy books and Warhammer Quest 1995.

The followup to Traumatarium, Penitent aims to improve on the success of the original, while improving and expanding on almost all aspects. You have three distinct dungeons to overcome, all while managing scarce resources and making hard decisions on when to push on, or use a map to return to the safety of one of the few outposts found in those dark halls.

Traumatarium Penitent takes place well after the events of the original game. The kingdom's knights have broken into two factions: the Penitents, who swore to pay off their sins in defense of the kingdom, and the Ebon Legion, who aim to bring forth again the evil spirits that once haunted the land.

name: Night Project
description: Night Project is the first game to introduce you to the history of corporate Degrees Intertainment. As you progress through the game, you will be able to find notes that will fully describe to you the entire deep history of the largest corporation in this game universe. The main antagonist is not a successful experiment of the Degrees Laboratories companies, called the "Kili project". Your task is not only to search for keys and notes, but also to simultaneously deceive the AI, whose task is to scare you as much as possible.

name: Fantasmigon
description: Fantasmigon is an original turn-based strategy set in a vibrant fantasy world. Engage in thrilling battles and tactical gameplay as you lead your band of characters through challenging encounters

name: Crop Chronicles
description: Dive into Crop Chronicles, where farm gaming evolves! Race against time, manage diverse crops, and fulfill dynamic orders. Embrace strategy and teamwork across 47 thrilling levels. Farm, fish, and flourish in this captivating adventure!

name: Space Wackos
description: Metal Raiders is a multiplayer and cooperative FPS game made by Nelson Peralta. Players can create an account in order to play and keep track of their progress.‍Featuring 8 maps and 6 game types, players have the freedom fight against each other in free-for-all or as a team.

name: Miniature Mayhem!
description: In Miniature Mayhem, mad scientist Victor's experiment goes awry with a rogue gamma ray. Chaos ensues as the Mayhem Miniatures are born. Wreak havoc and compete against friends in hazardous environments filled with power-ups and weapons!

name: Hanctt Origins
description: Hanctt is a continent covered with fog, and surviving in the black fog, which is called black fog, is next to impossible.

name: Joutsen Ara
description: Joutsen Ara is a Indie short game made as a part of the 2021 Good Game Jam. It tells story of two girls each in a different side of the world, both with a passion for nature. A blue macaw takes flight in Brazil and a whooper swan in Finland, both girls decide to chase after them!

name: StellaGale: The Trials Of Faith
description: Fight alongside your spirit-Brother through this handcrafted 2D hack-n-slash colosseum arena, set in the steampunk Roman Empire! Be the strongest gladiator and rise to the deadliest colosseum as you seek the truth of your father’s darkest secret.

name: WizardChess
description: WizardChess is Deckbuilding Chess. The roguelike gameplay includes procedurally generated maps, randomized encounters, individual unit modifiers and permadeath. It is designed to challenge the player strategically through short runs (20-30 minutes) with gameplay that is simply to pick up, but near impossible to master!

name: Realms of Pixel
description:
Embark on an epic journey in this classic pixel RPG mobile game!

This is a classic pixel RPG mobile game. Dive into nostalgic pixel art, strategic battles, and an engaging storyline. Build your lineup, explore vast worlds, and conquer challenging dungeons. Adventure awaits at your fingertips!

name: SnaPaul
description:
The tragic horror story of a prank gone terribly wrong – a chilling horror experience.

SnaPaul is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore a dark, mysterious house. With 30/40 minutes of intense gameplay, every step brings you closer to a chilling finale. Face your fears and uncover hidden secrets in this unforgettable experience.

name: Horror Adventure: Zombie Edition
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Shy Cats + Shy Dogs
description: Explore a triple pack full of cuteness and music! Find over 870 items in amazing locations like Rio, Tokyo, Paris, Atlantis, Mars, etc. Solve puzzles, listen to fun songs and create your own melody in this wonderful musical adventure!

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks Vol. 1
description: A unique musical hidden object game where you explore Paris, Rio de Janeiro, and Tokyo to find choir-singing kittens and money bags to hire a cat band, impress local music critics, and mix your own song.

name: Isolation
description: One can be too alone...

name: DWG 2024 Bundle
description: DWG 2024 Bundle includes a selection of some of the games that were published by Desert Water Games in 2024.

name: Okami + Kunitsu-Gami Bundle
description: Enjoy two unique Capcom titles, each of which tells its own tale of the gods: Okami HD and Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess.

name: Connect Collect
description: Situational card battle and adventure to find the best combo from a randomly dealt hand. Deck editing is not required....... To use your cards well, you need to bond with your friends. Only time will tell.......

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Japan
description: Bimfli and his travels in time is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect.

name: Mr. Slime in Dungeon
description: A 2D side-scrolling adventure. Run, jump, and slide as you explore dungeons, collect coins, and unlock the portal chest to advance to the next stage. Help Mr. Slime achieves his goal of becoming the richest slime in the dungeon.

name: Night at the Office
description: You work late at the office not long after the death of a colleague. Throughout the night, all sorts of phenomenon begin to terrorize you, slowly uncovering the death of a fellow colleague. Who killed Joseph Anadam and why must you go through this trial to find out?

name: The Golden Eagle
description: action-packed adventure game

name: Pokemon: The Hodgepodge Platoon
description: Hodgepodge Platoon is a Pokemon Emerald ROM Hack featuring 80+ usable Fakemon in a facility very similar to the Battle Factory. You'll be faced with brand new moves, abilities, stat spreads, and more, spanning all 9 generations of Pokemon. All of the playable Fakemon are lovingly designed and sprited by over 20 different artists. Hop on in and try to get the biggest streak, and fill out the Pokedex along the way!

name: Five Minutes Till Christmas
description: Race against the clock in Five Minutes Till Christmas, a fast-paced holiday arcade game! Sprint through a bustling mall to gather last-minute gifts, evade vigilant security guards, and complete as many whishes before the time runs out. Perfect your strategy to top the global leaderboards!

name: Panelak
description: Panelak Panelak is a post-Soviet old apartment building where weird things happen. Can you manage to get to the roof and save the helpless man?

name: Slugger 2
description: The sequel to Chris Hansen's first Slugger map

name: Clueless Crew
description: Scavenge through abandoned locations with your friends, buy tools, and venture further into eerie corridors and rooms filled with monsters and ghosts, then haul the loot back to the truck before dawn.

name: Panda Eat Bamboo
description: Escape the busy pace of life and immerse yourself in the calming embrace of nature with our delightful healing game. Spend quality time with charming pandas, de-stress, and rediscover your peace of mind.

name: Bopimo!
description: A Free to play, online 3D platformer where players can create their own levels.

name: Pyromania
description: Pyromania is an action-packed horde survival game. Strategy and movement are key to surviving the ever-growing hordes of zombies, wild animals and other monsters. It can be played either solo or in online-coop with up to 4 players.

name: Nick Brawl Community Edition
description: It's time to get back into the Brawl! Introducing Nick Brawl Community Edition, a community-made patch for the Steam version of Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl full of bug-fixes, new features, and more!

name: Osaka's Dream
description: Osaka's friends have been kidnapped by a mysterious entity. Find them by looking through a whopping 1 level in this demo.

name: Brok: Natal Tail, A New Christmas
description: A Christmas tale set in the world of BROK the InvestiGator, presented as a visual novel.

name: Tiny Divide
description: Endlessly split tiles into smaller fragments and compete on the leaderboard to reach the tiniest divide.

name: Tile Cities 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bit-Cremental: Fishistry
description: Grow fish with a gashapon twist in this bite-sized idler. Feed, nurture, and watch as fisher people reel in mature catches, earning money to upgrade things like feeding, growth, and fishing speeds for even faster profits.

name: Watermelon Simulator
description: Watermelon Simulator is a game in which you can become a watermelon.

name: Prey of the Night
description: Become a night owl, soaring through an infinite forest under the moonlit sky. Skillfully avoid obstacles, hunt for prey to gain strength, and perch to regain stamina. But beware—every moment in the shadows tests your survival. How long can you conquer the night?

name: Lost in Anomaly
description: You wake up on the 9th floor of an unknown building. The only way out of here is to detect and mark anomalies. One wrong move and you could be trapped forever.

name: Project Rebirth
description: Fight for your life in a high-security prison where dangerous experiments have unleashed a deadly mutation. Solve puzzles, hide from a crazy doctor, and survive intense encounters as you attempt to escape this nightmare.

name: Elemental
description: A cute and cozy puzzle game themed around the elements. Despite the easy-going art style, the game's puzzles can be quite challenging. Make your way through eleMENTAL by merging elements, discovering new interactions, and solving mind-bending puzzles.

name: The Cabin Factory
description: Your job at the Cabin Factory is simple: inspect the cabins and decide on whether they’re haunted or not. If you do find any anomalies, get out…immediately.

name: Hit A Plane
description: This is a simple casual flying game where players control their fighter jets to eliminate enemies, and their scores accumulate points as the enemies are eliminated!

name: Outrun
description: After leaving her relationship, Allison stays at a motel where nothing quite makes sense. Later, play as Emma on her night shift - where the story begins. Through Emma's eyes, you'll finally understand the confusing moments from Allison's stay. Enter the mystery - each twist darker than the last.

name: Care
description: Care is an atmospheric first person horror game where your choices have consequences. Be observant with your surroundings and unravel the horrific secrets that hide within these walls.

name: Archer Maclean's DropZone: 40th Anniversary Edition
description: Celebrating a Retro Classic: The Return of DropZone in "ARCHER MACLEAN'S DROPZONE - 40th ANNIVERSARY EDITION"

name: Bunny Mazes
description: Bunny Mazes is a 2D maze game where you need to make your way through 50 levels, consisting of 500 mazes, within time limit. Collect time bonuses, avoid dangers and decide what path to go to complete all the mazes.

name: Boardroom Alpha
description: Sin descripción

name: Do No Harm
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Tail 2: Digital Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Tail 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Meshimase! Remilia Ojou-sama!
description: This is a game in which Sakuya, in her spare time, presses various things on Remilia and enjoys her reactions.

name: Jumping Ninja
description: Awaken the true warrior within!

name: The Hunt Begins
description:
In The Hunt Begins, you and up to four friends go to a haunted location to identify and eradicate a ghost. On arrival at the location, the game will select one of the players to control the ghost and protect their haunt.

Hunt the Ghost:
You and up to 3 friends must work together to locate the ghost players chosen haunted area. Use multiple tools to identify the type of ghost and use the correct method to banish them. Be careful though, the ghost does not like trespassers and if enraged will take lives.

Hunt the Hunters:
Your friends have come to purge your existence as you control ghosts that haunt various locations. Prevent them from finding your chosen haunted area and from figuring out how to destroy you. Use your abilities and interact with the maps to frighten your friends and get closer to hunting them down.

name: Chernobylite: Complete Edition
description: Chernobylite is a non-linerar, science-fiction survival horror RPG. Explore the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and uncover the truth of your tortured past.

name: Heritage
description: HERITAGE is a psychological horror game where you dive into the dark secrets of a forgotten mansion. Explore shadowy rooms, solve puzzles, and uncover the hidden truth behind a family tragedy, all within a tense and eerie atmosphere.

name: Orpheus' Revenge
description: Get ready to put your mouse to use and get smack talked by a bunch of pixels! Orpheus' Revenge is an 80s inspired arcade shooter with more sass than sense. Pixel graphics, neon colours and electronic beats meet greek mythology.

name: Subvirtual
description: Clear the subgrid of cubes without touching the bombs by sorting out how many connections are safe! Happy puzzling!

name: Creepy Claus
description: It’s your first day on the job in Santa’s workshop, but it’s already off to a bad start. Santa isn’t impressed with your work, and now he’s chasing you down. The only way out? WRAP THE PRESENTS the job is simple :)

name: Cities Domination
description: Cities Domination is a city builder, resource management and strategy game. Gestion all the units and resources between cities for create an empire, attack enemies cities, build, defend and expand your cities and dominate the castles... or lose yours.

name: Luna's Twilight
description: Luna's Twilight is a fantasy romance visual novel that brings together classic fantasy elements with heart-fluttering romance. In a secluded mansion hidden deep within a a silent forest, four men from different races whisper words of love to you. Who will be the one to win your heart?

name: Carnage Kart X
description: Carnage Kart X is a retro-inspired hack n' slash experience combining the feel of classic karting games from the early 90s with Vampire Survivors-like gameplay, combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and low-poly 3D models for a new perspective on the Survivors-like genre. It's style is reminiscent of something you'd play at the arcade down to the rockin' over-the-top music and over-sized blood spurts/body parts flying off of enemies.

name: Defense Breakers
description: A roguelike tower defense game. Pick your players, collect treasures, and break through the enemy's heavy barriers. Each expedition brings a new experience.

name: Croaktopia
description: Cozy game where you can farm, build, and fight as a cute frog!

name: Clicky Coven
description: Clicky Coven is an incremental game about building a witch coven. Assign witches to gather ingredients, brew potions, and sell them to earn gold.

name: Furry Adventure Club and the Holy Grail
description: Brave Furry heroes in Furry Adventure Club and the Holy Grail as they embark on an epic quest to find the legendary Golden Grail. Solve a variety of puzzles and explore mysterious locations

name: Kletka
description: Kletka is a co-op horror game about going down in an elevator that is trying to eat you. Feed the elevator, explore deadly floors and descend deeper.

name: Night of The Abattoir Man
description: The story of Michael D'Amato, a young 23-year-old man who flies to New York with the intention of starring in his uncle's new horror movie. However, he finds himself in a real-life horror scenario as he becomes the target of a 10-foot-tall maniac known as the Abattoir Man.

name: The Power of Doznath
description: Discover the mysteries around the secret thumb of Doznath.

name: Feed The Gods
description: Feed The Gods is a fun card battler for 3-6 players. Enter a chaotic party roguelike where you and your friends forge your way using powerful cards. Escape the pit of doom and leave rival cultists to be devoured by the ravenous Hungry Ancient Deity.

name: Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Adventure
description: Jumper is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

name: Seedsow Lullaby
description: "My mother, my daughter, and me—three sixteen-year-olds on an extraordinary adventure."After traveling through time to meet their sixteen-year-old counterparts, three generations of women set off on an adventure through the Land of the Gods. What could await them at the end of their journey?

name: Joyville 2
description: Joyville 2 is a first-person horror-puzzle adventure game set in an abandoned children's camp. You will explore the camp and encounter its magical inhabitants. By solving puzzles and overcoming challenges, you will travel between two parallel worlds, uncovering the secrets of this enigmatic...

name: Alpha and Iota
description: Alpha and Iota is a puzzle platformer about repairing a computer system inhabited by sentient agents. You operate a repair core, which can navigate the system by ejecting between a variety of different host types. Some hosts are fixed in place, while others jump, slide, climb walls, or follow rails.

name: Corpo Connections
description: Match anomalies and descriptions to make connections that unravel the mysterious workings of your new employer in this stylistic horror adventure game.

name: Seal the Rift
description: Discover an endlessly replayable roguelike deckbuilder. Craft a unique deck to overcome the challenges ahead. Collect powerful relics, harness potent magic and skillfully make use of the "Boost" mechanic to Seal the Rift!

name: DOSMan: Space Aliens in Space!
description: Planet DOS is under attack by Space Aliens, DOSMan needs to fend them off and defend his home planet.

name: FuryDough
description:
FuryDough is an action roguelite where donuts are everywhere, and you will hate them. Break through mazes, fight with a crowd of zany doughy adversaries, find and destroy Dough Mixers.
This is not a sweet dream, but a real nightmare.

name: Pine: A Story of Loss
description: Alone in the forest glade he shared with his wife, a woodworker struggles to accept her passing. Help him hold on to cherished memories of their life together as he struggles to care for himself and his now empty home. Pine is a single-serving game focused on telling a beautiful, emotional tale.

name: Carnage
description: A love letter to the top-down racing games of yore. Race and shoot your way through a varied dystopian world to collect and upgrade your vehicles to survive and prosper in the CARnage.

name: Shaqing
description: "Shaqing" is a Chinese horror puzzle game set in "Wuzhan Town". Players must help the protagonist escape an evil scene where dreams and reality blur, and save his beloved. The objective is to help the protagonist escape and save his beloved.

name: Dubio
description: Dubio is a game of tiny puzzle parcours. It offers a A challenging mix of puzzle-solving and momentum control. Jump and bounce through 100 levels that test your wits and sense of timing. Or are there more?

name: Corpo/Ghost
description: Infiltrate various companies, tap into their databases and exit while avoiding contact with employees. You have been invited to participate in the virtual planning of corporate espionage missions.

name: The Exile Princes
description: A story focused, old school, procedural RPG: raise your banner and bring your house to victory in the unique medieval fantasy setting of the Exile Realms. Start out in questing service, gain companions, followers, power and influence, and ultimately through strength or guile learn to rule the lands.

name: Paper Plane Arena: Shamans
description: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Invisible Flow
description: Dig deep into the Invisible Flow, where you'll investigate once-chill Lush Palms island! Gather resources, craft tools and explore the vast map to survive among the Gasmentis. Solve puzzles and unravel the ties between the local lab and the eerie gas lurking around. Find out who's behind it!️

name: Bobos FunZone
description: Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about.

name: Ericanskinsmonsters
description: Join Ericanskinsmonsters and her band of misfits as they embark on a dangerous undertaking to save the realm of Strifestav from a cruel necromancer and his army of undead at any cost. Nothing will stand between you and your vengeance in this classic style turn based rpg!

name: Glitched Out
description: Trapped in the depths of a top secret alien research facility, Lex must team up with A.I companion 'Chip' and hack her way to freedom. Along the way, she discovers the sinister secrets of the facility and meets the many monstrous creatures contained within.

name: Ruins To Fortress
description: Explore a post-apocalyptic island, craft, build, tear down enemy bases, defend and nuke your rivals! Life's about surviving in this multiplayer game, no matter what it takes!

name: Paradise's Secrets
description: After accepting the invitation from the Paradise company following the events we've experienced, nothing on our journey may turn out as we expect. You must be very careful to uncover all the mystery and reveal the truth. Learn everything and expose the true face of the Paradise company

name: Orbital Defense Force
description: Orbital Defense Force (O.D.F) is a multiplayer shoot 'em up co-op rogue-like game. play as mercenaries working for the O.D.F., accepting contracts to defend planets from invaders and earn precious scrap that can be used to upgrade their ship to take on more difficult contracts.

name: Cowboy 3030
description: Step into the Wild West future of Cowboy 3030, a third-person roguelite bullet hell where you dive into action-packed shootouts as different playable characters, each with unique abilities and playstyles, to take on notorious outlaws and criminals and rise to become top gun of 3030.

name: Warframe: 1999
description:
Warframe: 1999 is the time-bending follow-up due for release the following year and features a distinctive, licensed track by seminal industrial rock band Nine Inch Nails: “Into the Void.” In 2024, the Tenno will return to the past in order to understand their future, and reveal the motives behind Albrecht Entrati’s perplexing research. But everything is not as it seems…

The pieces of the puzzle are falling into place, Tenno. But it will be up to you to solve it.

name: Gehenna
description: The sun has vanished, and darkness corrodes the world. An angel named Helvetica is summoned. She claims to be "an angel that surpasses even the gods" and repels the distorted sun goddess. However, in order to restore the sun, she must capture the goddess.

name: Ripple in Dirac Sea
description: PvPvE moba-like game: 2 teams (1 god and 6 heroes per team) fight each other in a 2km*2km map with random starting points, random shops, and random monster bosses. 80% Action - heroes , 20% RTS - god .

name: DoughNuts
description: DoughNuts is an exhilarating top-down roguelite shooter that revolves around a map composed of randomly arranged cells. Navigate through the map, carefully choosing which cell to uncover next. Each step may lead to intense battles with doughy invaders, valuable bonuses, or crazy bosses.

name: Wizard Shrimp
description: Wizard Shrimp is a bullet-hell roguelike game where you play as a Shrimp who inexplicably is also a Wizard?! Battle your way out of three different areas whilst gaining many different upgrades and power ups to become the most powerful Shrimp this world has ever seen!

name: Snowball Fight Game
description: Snowball Fight Game is a one button, bullet-hell action game, featuring progressively difficult hand-crafted levels and bosses. It pays homage to retro-flash games of old with its simple controls and satisfying gameplay.

name: Valledi
description: Mergulhe em uma desafiadora aventura de luto e superação com Diana e seu drone em busca de uma antiga lenda, passando por montanhas, cavernas, minas e muito mais em uma jornada em um misterioso vale perdido.

name: Lone Wolf
description:
Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.

This game was made with the love of the beat-em up arcade machines and console games of the 1980's and 1990's, taking some of the mechanics of these games mixed with some more modern gameplay.

name: 10 Dead Doves
description: 10 Dead Doves is a single-player, fixed-perspective narrative horror set in the heart of Appalachia. Avoid strange noises, collect lifelines, and creep through a forest that seems to hate you. Will you discover why the birds drop dead -- or leave behind nothing but footprints?

name: Witch and Council
description: Make a group with attractive characters, build your deck and stave off the characteristic enemies in Witch and Council, a roguelike deckbuilder game. Your small choices will make great changes every moment. We invite you to the witch world full of diverse characters and interesting scenarios.

name: SimRail: The Railway Simulator
description: SimRail is new, advanced railway simulator. Master high-speed long-distance EMU, heavy freight hauls and suburban trains. Travel 500 km of geodetic-data based real routes. Become train dispatcher and control the traffic according to the schedule or cooperate with other players on multiplayer mode.

name: Midnight Paradise
description: Midnight Paradise is an adult Visual Novel with a focus on the daily life of a young man trying to build a criminal empire. As you acquire more power and influence, both the rewards and risks increase.

name: Aretisia: Tenebris Dominus
description: An RPG Maker game in which you need to stop the resurrection of an entity that was responsible for a devastating war 20 years ago.

name: Pantheon: Rise of the Fallen
description: Pantheon: Rise of the Fallen is a group-focused MMORPG based on challenging gameplay and open world high fantasy. It takes place in a world populated by deities and heroes, called Terminus. Join the denizens of Terminus to uncover the mysteries of a world divided by Celestial loyalty… and betrayal. Make strong allies, or even stronger foes while you explore a captivating landscape that has its own stories to tell.

name: Sirensia: A Date Beneath
description: A burnout man's story, leading him into a tale of tragedy.

name: Planet Coaster 2: Thrill-Seekers Ride Pack
description: Prepare to spin, whirl and wow your guests with the Thrill-Seekers Ride Pack. Create and customise a swirling sensation with five high-adrenaline new attractions that are sure to provide your guests with the ride of a lifetime - if they're brave enough!

name: Undisputed: The Problem Child Pack
description: Undisputed brings you The Problem Child Pack, featuring Jake ‘El Gallo De Dorado' Paul, as well as six other epic fighters including Zhilei Zhang, Juan Manuel Márquez, Erik Morales, Marco Antonio Barrera, James ‘Buster' Douglas, and Otto Wallin, along with six new sets of ring attire for the current roster.

name: Dreamless Girl: Deluxe Edition
description:
Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

Deluxe Edition includes character skinpackage "Rose-hued Uniforms" , includes one skin each for characters Mu Deng, Plague Nun, and ZZ. These skins unlock automatically after completing specific levels.

name: Dreamless Girl
description:
Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

name: Hitman World of Assassination Celebrity Bundle
description: Permanently unlock three Celebrity Packs and Elusive Target inspired cosmetics featuring The Undying, The Drop and The Splitter with The Celebrity Bundle.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Ultimate Edition
description:
This is a special product includes:
- "THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV" Base game
- KOF XV Team Pass 1
- KOF XV Team Pass 2
- KOF XV Fighter Pass
- KOF XV DLC Character "MATURE"" and ""VICE"
- KOF XV DLC Costume "GAROU: MotW TERRY"
- KOF XV DLC Costume "CLASSIC LEONA"

name: Ketsu Battler
description: Sin descripción

name: Artifact Seeker
description: Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game.You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. Use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods or to end the game ? Your choice.

name: Bounce
description:
Play the ball with simple rules and controls!
Just pull the ball like a slingshot!
Aim ifor the same color target and give a GREAT shoot.

name: Airplane Flight Simulator: Dangerous Landings
description: Handle Extreme Landing Situations in Airplane Flight Simulator : Dangerous Landings

name: Alice in Wonderland: Magical Labyrinth
description:
Embark on a magical journey with Alice through the Wonderland labyrinths.
Solve challenging mazes, explore unimaginable worlds

name: Box Chaos
description: Solve the tricky puzzles to earn Bitnuts and repair the little robot.

name: Distillery & Tavern Duo: Moonshine Inc. + Crossroads Inn: A Fantasy Tavern Sim
description: Run the inn, brew the moonshine – business awaits!

name: Cowboys vs. Zombies
description: Fight for survival in the Wild West!

name: Eggconsole Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes II PC-8801mkIISR
description: An RPG set in a world 20 years after the previous installment. Take on the role of Prince Atlas and confront a new darkness threatening the peace of Eselhasa.

name: Gun Fire: AI Rebellion
description: The futuristic Human City has been plunged into crisis by an invasion of AI robots. Experience intense battles against advanced AI drones and giant robots!

name: Piyo Puzz: Piyokoro x Puzzle
description:
Piyokoro returns as a Puzzle Game!
Connect pieces by Color and Shape!
Play solo or with up to four players!

name: Sparking Beam Strike 1000
description:
Puzzle Your Way by Controlling the Light!
Reflect the beams and hit the targets right!

name: The Kingdom of Christmas: Santa's Elves
description: In the magical world of Christmas, Smiley, a cheerful and brave elf, works in the North Pole toy factory.

name: The Zvengers: Infinity Defense
description: The Z virus, able to turn anyone into a monster, was stolen?! At this rate, the monsters will take over. Stop the villain who stole the Z virus and save the world!

3072 is a classic puzzle game that combines two identical color block numbers into a new number by moving them up and down, left and right. Your goal is very simple, to reach 3072, come and challenge.

name: Yamizome Liberator
description: Yamizome Liberator is a modern visual novel with real-time deckbuilding combat. Plan and unleash skills in tactical 1v1 battles against magical girls, manage daytime events, and liberate heroines in a race against time. A bold mix of tactical gameplay, dark humor, and captivating storytelling!

name: Exercise Your Demons!
description: Unleash your inner beast and battle back hordes of demons and beads of sweat. With the finest fitness trainers from the Infernal Gymnasium guiding your every move, you’ll throw down in your living room to save the world from an untimely demonic demise.

name: 3D MiniGolf: Makeover-Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Panic Room
description: In Panic Room, your space will be invaded and destroyed by thousands of spiders and then become the set of one of Hollywood's most famous horror scenes.

name: Mombo Combo Legacy
description: Get ready for an epic journey into the vibrant universe of Mombo Combo Legacy, a platform game full of action and adventure! Defeat monstrous enemies and complete insane challenges to create incredible combos. Conquer powerful forms and unlock MOMBASTIC abilities to explore memorable worlds!

name: Hidden Tomatoes
description: Hidden Tomatoes is a relaxing hidden object game where you search for 100 hidden tomatoes in a detailed city environment. Explore the streets, buildings, and alleys at your own pace, with no time limits or pressure. Can you spot all the tomatoes?

name: Clash Battle Simulator
description: Ready for the ultimate battle? Dive in and test your strategy skills now!

name: In Memoriam
description: Sin descripción

name: Waifu Simulator: Christmas Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: CybArena
description: CybArena is a wave-based survival game set in a gritty cyberpunk dystopia. Battle endless waves of enemies, harness powerful perks and power-ups, and see how long you can endure. How far will you go?

name: Maze Company
description: A short horror walking simulator where you just head from the workroom to the exit. Something may happen along the way, but don't worry, just keep going.Your goal is to return.

name: What Is in the Black Box?
description: Prepare to embark on a journey of reflection, where you’ll seek answers to profound questions and uncover the ultimate truth: What truly lies within the black box?

name: Arcade Archives: Viper Phase 1
description:
Heroes will surely return.
Carrying the hope of the entire galaxy.

name: 10-in-1 Christmas Collection
description: 10 games with guaranteed entertaining fun await you in this Christmas Collection!

name: Anime Girls: Lovely Lolita
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: DigiGods: Build and Battle
description: Create, play, & share in a physics-based sandbox environment where you can shoot, parkour, or simulate any type of gameplay you desire, taking the best of VR goofiness.

name: Zigzag Car
description: Sin descripción

name: Astro Bot: Winter Wonder
description: The Christmas-themed DLC level for Astro Bot

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Movie Pack
description:
When transported to an unknown dimension, Shadow must race through the streets of modern-day Shibuya to defeat the forces of G.U.N.

Take on a new look as Shadow and play through a unique level inspired by the new movie, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, featuring the voice of Keanu Reeves!

name: Frog Detective -1
description:
If you look up the word Frog, detective, and prequel...well...you'd be reading a book and not playing this unofficial prequel to the Frog Detective games!

So put down that book and pick up the gauntlet that has been thrown down at your feet, to solve a mystery like no other.

Best played on an actual Game Boy (a pocket would be best!)
Download the ROM at the bottom of the page and use an emulator like BGB, Sameboy or MGBA to play!

name: Cartas de Coisas
description:
A game within a game, Cartas de Coisas (Cards of Things) invites players to wager on a gacha simulator to win cards representing animals, games, cultural icons, and literary figures. These cards contribute to your Fighting Power, a resource essential for facing and hunting down hordes of aliens within the Liturgy. Each opened Gate reveals a new epistle—fragmented stories that unveil the creation of every layer of the game's universe.

On its official page, Cards of Things (Cartas de Coisas) describes itself this way:

"There is a game called Cards of Things, which some people believe can replace the weariness of life with a terrible feeling known as Agony.
Of course, you don't want to live in Agony: just stay away from these cards.
After all, you should be working.
You like your job.
Staring at the wall.
You don't need the torment of Agony."

name: Helldivers 2: Omens of Tyranny
description: The sightings, rumors, conspiracy theories. They were all true. The ancient Illuminate civilization are back from extinction!

name: CheckOut
description: Checkout is a psychological horror walking simulator where players attempt to escape from endlessly looping hotel corridors. The game delivers an intense immersion with its tension-building soundtrack and realistic graphics. Unravel the hidden stories and find your way out of the hotel.

name: Warframe: Nyx Warframe
description:
Warframe is pulling up to The Game Awards 2024 with plenty of goodies and great news to share!

Claim now to receive a free Nyx Warframe with a free Warframe Slot, for a limited time only.

name: No Man's Sky: Starborn Phoenix Ship
description:
An exclusive reforged starship, commemorating a time when Travellers old and new joined together to voyage across the stars.

This unusual ship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes.

To add this ship to your collection, visit the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion aboard the Space Anomaly and choose "Collect Special Rewards".

name: Bridge Constructor Studio
description:
Test your construction expertise with dozens of distinct bridge-building puzzles across varied biomes. Seven different vehicles and multiple construction materials (wood, steel, cables, concrete pillars, and roadways) ensure each puzzle is a fresh and varied challenge.

With no budget restrictions or material limits, you are free to experiment and design without constraints. For an extra challenge, earn a special award by keeping costs within a set budget while ensuring your bridge holds up under pressure!

Design and play your very own bridge-building scenarios! Choose from five biomes, seven vehicles, and a variety of obstacles and checkpoints to design your own challenges. Up to 40 custom levels can be saved per player profile.

Mixed Reality (Quest 3 Exclusive): View your creations in the real world with Mixed Reality! Seamlessly switch between VR and Passthrough modes to experience the game in a whole new way.

name: Helldivers 2: TR-117 Alpha Commander Armor Set
description:
TR-117 ALPHA COMMANDER
For warriors who are so strong and confident that they don't need any reassurance whatsoever.

name: LEGO Fortnite: Brick Life
description:
Build your new life in an ever-evolving LEGO city.

Experience a highly social destination for up to 32 players where you can explore all the city has to offer!

Be the ultimate socialite and hang out in restaurants, house parties or rooftop clubs. Chat with friends or make new ones, activities in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life are better together. Host a band practice down the beach, grab a bite to eat with others or race through the streets on hover boards.

Take on a job, complete tasks to earn some spending money and start living the life in Brick Bay with vehicles, housing and more. Customize your home with furnishings from the local store or invite your friends over to hang out.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: The Ouroboros Express
description: Play as Vivienne Sanssouci, a daring journalist who has been tasked to review the Ouroboros Express. She quickly notices that this is not your regular train—and a devastating secret changes her life forever, and that of the other passengers…

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 8
description: This dlc contains 3 classic tables: Banzai Run, Black Knight 2000, and Earthshaker.

name: Kemotaku
description: "Kemotaku" is a brand new roguelike card game mixed with puzzle, deck-building and tower-defence. Beat away attacking enemies and defend your town with a variety of animals!

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Omens of Destruction: Gorbad
description: Introduces one of the most infamous of all Orc Warbosses, Gorbad Ironclaw, as a playable Legendary Lord alongside a deadly host of new battle units, gameplay features and objectives to be experienced in the immense Immortal Empires campaign or Custom Battles.

name: PawnShop Simulator
description: Turn the space into a pawn shop! Use fresh paint, stylish floors, and organized shelves to display your items. Buy and sell different goods, making smart, profitable deals. Keep the shop clean to attract customers and sell your items.

name: Diamond Word
description: Diamond Word is a word action game where you need to make quick decisions, making the needed words from the letters flying up. Direct the letter to the place where you plan to make a word. Erase unnecessary words, making room on the field for the necessary (Diamond) word.

name: Warplanes: WW2 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Warplanes: WW1 + WW2 + Space Commander Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat! Three thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces, Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Space Commander: War and Trade.

name: Metal Dragon/Life on Mars
description: Kai Magazine Software brings two action-packed 16-bit titles to Evercade. Battle to prevent World War III in Metal Dragon, and solve the mystery of a seemingly abandoned space colony in Life on Mars!

name: Anzu
description: Solve match-4 puzzles with Anzu to gather treasure, hatch eggs, and discover all the secrets of the prehistoric hub!

name: Meow Moments: Celebrating Renewal & Romance
description: Join cute cats in festive scenes! Find feline friends and pop balloons as you explore New Year's on Copacabana beach and share sweet moments for Valentine’s Day.

name: Malu the Princess
description: Help Malu Reclaim Her Stolen Crown!

name: Breath of Death VII: The Beginning - Reanimated
description: The fast-paced supernatural RPG, Breath of Death VII, has been resurrected and remastered! Embark with our undead heroes on a bone-rattling post-apocalyptic adventure through an undead world, now more vibrant than ever, to exhume the mysteries of the past.

name: Castle Doombad Classic
description: Become the villain and slay any hero who dares enter your evil domain! Deploy traps and minions as the ultimate diabolical dungeon keeper in this Tower Defense puzzler. Includes the 2014 Castle Doombad game plus new improvements and content.

name: The Finals: Season 5 - Next Stage
description:
Season 5 is the current and the fifth season of THE FINALS. It launched on December 12, 2024, and is expected to end on March 20, 2025.

This season is sponsored by VAIIYA, DISSUN and the returning sponsor ISEUL-T, who introduced the all-new arena Bernal.

New content introduced in Season 5 includes:
- Arena: Bernal
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: Cerberus 12GA, ShAK-50
- Gadgets: Gravity Vortex, Lockbolt Launcher
- New weapon sights
- Clubs
- Progression: new sponsorships, new career levels

name: Zen Pinball World
description: Zen Pinball World brings you the latest and greatest pinball tables to mobile! Dive into the next evolution of pinball mastery from Zen Studios, inspired by the biggest entertainment brands.

name: Sidewalk Simulator
description: Build your defense, perfect your movement, true your aim. Upgrade and unlock weapons, items, and people to help you destroy tax evaders, the impoverished, and many other demons. Enter this simulation as a small wet boy, and leave completely ENHANCED.

name: Find All: Christmas
description: What's that ringing filled the air? A wonder is coming! Santa has once again received many letters of wishes. The production conveyor have started! The Christmas season is upon us! Find 150 different items to give presents to everyone!

name: Hidden Cats 2: Crafts
description: All professions are important, all professions are needed! Explore a world of crafts, each with a place for cats. Find them and the world will be colored!

name: Cosmic Royale
description: Get ready for frantic free-to-play racing battle royale in a crazy sci-fi universe! Take on 40 players in an intense competition packed with obstacles and gravity-defying challenges.

name: Spot The Difference: Classic Finding Puzzle
description: Classic puzzle with finding differences - show all your attentiveness and ingenuity to find all the differences in the pictures!

name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep2: The Old School Building
description:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 2: Escape from The Old School Building!

name: Super Waifu Ball
description: Get ready for a gravity-defying, action-packed adventure in Super Waifu Ball, an arcade-style game where you roll through vibrant, obstacle-filled worlds as you control a cast of lovable waifus. Master each level, collect stars, and navigate through increasingly tricky courses to unlock exciting rewards and surprises!

name: Smoots Summer Games II
description: Compete with up to 4 players in Smoots Summer Games II, the cartoon-styled arcade sequel. Enjoy classic and new events like the 100m dash, swimming, cycling, archery, and more. Master game modes including Practice, Championship, Special Challenge, and Battle Royale.

name: Cat Simulator: Neighbor's Nightmare
description: Sin descripción

name: Demon Alive
description: Enter the ancient forest ruled by cursed demons. Your mission: Find the hidden chalices. But beware – the demons use these chalices to teleport you to eerie, dangerous places!

name: Arobynn: Sword of Adventure
