description: [Sword Art Online]-Like | Welcome to the adventurer's guild! Fight, explore, and grow stronger in this VR world (keyboard and mouse support coming soon!).

name: Block Puzzle
description: An interesting block match puzzle game.

name: Banana Next Gen
description: Banana Next Gen is a fun-filled 2D/3D side-scroller where you control a flying banana trapped in the Banana King's castle. Collect coins, unlock levels, and face the tyrannical Banana King in an epic final showdown. Can you save your family and escape?

name: Pokémon Emerald Legacy
description: Emerald Legacy is the finale of the three planned projects in the Legacy Trilogy. It is made using the Pokémon Emerald disassembly made by the Pret team. This game is focused on refining a game considered a classic while using 20+ years of hindsight to improve the experience. Emerald is a great game with a ton of flaws when you look at the game critically; poor Pokémon availability, odd team-building choices, a great story executed poorly, baffling rival decisions, and an Elite Four in dire need of improvement. Despite these flaws, Pokémon Emerald has maintained a positive reputation with memorable Pokédex additions, fantastic gym leader ace Pokémon, abilities, the Battle Frontier, and overall being a large step forward for the series. The Legacy Project aims to improve what makes this game great while improving its flaws.

name: Virus Hunter
description: Become a nanomachine and defend the human body from viruses and bacteria! How long you can live depends on your efforts.

name: Clones Run
description: A puzzle action game where Clone humans race through stages aiming for the goal! Move blocks that are impossible to handle alone by teaming up with everyone! Bring as many clones as possible to the goal!

name: Slicy Flips
description: Slicing is so easy and the pleasure is real.

name: Tri Breaker: A Sacred Symbols Odyssey
description: If Twin Breaker was a brick breaker about space, Tri Breaker is a brick breaker on steroids, and this go-around, it's all about time. Explore 40 stages spread across periods of galactic history, and obliterate the brick-breaking formula.

name: Riki 8Bit Game Collection
description: Riki 8bit Game Collection is not just one experience, but many. To be precise, it includes five unique games and music albums. Kira Kira Star Night lets you collect stars while running through a pixelated, surreal cityscape. In Astro Ninja Man DX, you defend against threats from above by shooting upwards—just like in the classic arcade games of the 70s and 80s. And the trilogy of albums—8bit Music Power, 8bit Music Power Final, and 8bit Music Power Encore—will stay with you long after you turn off the power.

name: Clone Drone in the Hyperdome
description: Cut robots apart in VR. Feel your sword disintegrate their metal bodies. Now you live and die in the Crashloop, a roguelike tournament to the death. Lock swords! Shoot shurikens from your wrist! This is CLONE DRONE... in the HYPERDOME!!!

name: Layup Legends
description: The basket-brawler for up to 4 players! Use your skills to outplay your opponents on a variety of stages. Unleash powerful super moves to destroy your enemies and become a Layup Legend. Play with your friends or CPUs in 1v1 and 2v2 matches locally or online.

name: Bronana
description: Bronana is a thrilling and hilarious survival roguelike. Embody the spirit of a fearless banana warrior to take down waves of vicious snack monsters. Through a rich variety of random events, grow stronger, evolve abilities, and face off against challenging bosses to save the homeland.

name: Poker Train
description: Poker Train is a video poker game where you must play scoring hands to keep the wheels turning. Use your best combinations to build steam and run the train as far as you can. Complete quests and find all the secrets the railroad has to offer!

name: Evershire
description: Discover the ever-growing lands of Evershire. A cozy, minimalist strategy builder that encourages creativity and offers a challenge to those looking for one. Decide whether you want to create and decorate your own worlds in creative mode or try your hand at managing resources. The choice is yours.

name: Anode Heart: Layer Null
description: Isometric card battler RPG with a touch of virtual creatures, set in a futuristic, digital world, with over-the-top villains and a very shadowy plot.

name: Mini Mini Golf Golf
description: An indie storytelling experience that goes beyond the lanes of the here and now into distant memories of a future planetary collapse. Destabilize the present and plunge into a neon psychohistory of a bizarre entity in distress. This is not a game about minigolf.

name: WhatRogue: Exile Land
description: "WhatRogue：Exile Land" blends roguelike, card construction, and tactical turn-based gameplay. The tactical element requires spatial strategies, enhancing strategic depth. Choose different heroes and companions to defeat various monsters and bosses.

name: ACA NeoGeo Selection Vol. 1
description:
A collection of Arcade Archives NEOGEO releases for the Nintendo Switch.

This package contains:
Alpha Mission II
Garou: Mark of the Wolves
Metal Slug X
Riding Hero
Samurai Shodown V
Savage Reign
Shock Troopers
The King of Fighters ’94
Top Hunter: Roddy & Cathy
Top Player’s Golf

name: ACA NeoGeo Selection Vol. 2
description:
A collection of Arcade Archives NEOGEO releases for the Nintendo Switch.
This package contains:
Baseball Stars Professional
Fatal Fury 2
Ghost Pilots
Metal Slug 4
Mutation Nation
Samurai Shodown
Shock Troopers: 2nd Squad
Stakes Winner 2
The King of Fighters ’95

name: Chroma Zero
description: Explore a unique and connected world. Understand its fragile balance, uncover its deepest questions, and find more than just the answers.

name: Parasitic Descent
description: In a world ravaged by a catastrophic event, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. In "Parasitic Descent," you step into the boots of a lone survivor navigating the haunting remnants of a once-thriving civilization.

name: Please Smile
description: A 3D platformer with 60 increasingly challenging rooms. Manipulate time to reverse the game's movements. Redirect gravity onto objects to reach the most impossible places. Jump, run, shoot, and dash, as only with all your abilities will you escape.

name: Hidden Cats in Tokyo
description: Hidden Cats in Tokyo is a hidden object adventure game where you must vaccinate all the cats in Tokyo before they turn into dangerous monsters. Collect cards of heroes, monsters, and cat things. Join the adventure and fight the huge monster with your giant robot in this fun hidden object game!

name: Azura's Crystals
description: Embark on an enchanting quest as Azura, a spirited heroine, and discover a world of ancient mysticism. Forge unbreakable bonds with mythical creatures using the power of Primalis Crystals. Traverse breathtaking landscapes, make difficult choices, and uncover the secrets that shape your destiny.

name: Bloodshed
description: BLOODSHED is an exhilarating fusion of Score Chasing gameplay and Roguelite elements, combined with lightning-fast and captivating, retro-styled first-person shooter action.

name: Outbreak Survivors
description: In the apocalypse, survive against the zombies until the rescue come for you. In this Action Roguelite game, you will unlock new weapons, characters and unique skills to help in your survival.

name: The King of Fighters XV: DLC Characters Mature & Vice
description: "MATURE" and "VICE" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

name: Ribbet
description: Join Ribbet, the young and mischievous frog, on an exciting adventure in this action-packed video game! Take on the role of Ribbet as you navigate through a myriad of challenging hazards and obstacles. With his small stature and incredible parkour skills, he can escape from any sticky situation.

name: Action Hero
description:
Punch dinosaurs in the face, battle ninjas with shotguns and chase bad guys on a speeding train in Action Hero, a blockbuster VR FPS with explosive set pieces and cinematic design.

Fight your way through five bombastic movies, stepping into the hero’s shoes. Gameplay proceeds in slow motion, only speeding up as the player moves. Lean around bullets with stylish satisfaction, catch weapons in mid-air and take down enormous bosses.

name: While Sleeping
description: A first-person horror game dealing with sleep paralysis. You are lying in bed, unable to move, experiencing creepy phenomena and having to survive until morning from ghosts.

name: Angelian Trigger
description: Angelian Trigger is a 3D shooting game in which you run through the screen while shooting down enemies.

name: Hidden Kittens: Kingdom of Cats
description: Discover hidden kittens in the Kingdom of Cats! Explore cute and minimalist scenes, solve puzzles, and find adorable feline companions!

name: Grizzly Man
description: 1983, Alaska... During the Salmon Run, a deadly figure known as The Grizzly Man terrorizes a group of tourists led by Bob, an amnesiac former Man in Black. Survive the journey or become the catch of the day in this breathtaking pixel-art interactive fiction with heart-pounding pace!

name: Paw Paw Death Festival
description: A simple job to execute sinners in a surrealistic way! Three casual party modes for free thinking and creative dark humor + with a great ridiculous comment function to get the audience together on your live streaming.

name: Airport X-Ray Simulator
description: Step into the critical role of a baggage security operative in Airport X-Ray Simulator. As part of the backbone of airport security, you are the last line of defense against prohibited or illegal items making their way onto an aircraft or into the airport.

name: Silent Mourning
description: Your sister has been missing for a few days. You head out to the cabin she was staying at, but it seems you're not the only one there

name: Automata Streetcar
description: An interactive, digital-media art project that uses historic streetcars as a metaphor to explore ideas about connection, communication, and community. Primarily intended for gallery / museum installations - or you can build your own Arduino-based controllers to play at home!

name: Murky Divers
description: Co-op diving horror. Eliminate all traces of your employer's failed experiments from their abandoned underwater labs. Navigate your submarine, dive down with your crew, remove all corpses, but watch out for the abyssal terrors lurking.

name: Deathless. Tales of Old Rus
description: A roguelike deck-building game set in the universe of the Tales of Old Rus that features epic Slavic heroes and monsters.

name: A Dash of Color
description: A Dash of Color is a fast-paced minimalist precision-platformer with occasional puzzle elements. Gameplay focuses on smooth movement and pathfinding through unique levels. Dash, dodge, dip, duck, dive, dye, and die on your way to victory!

name: Seal: What the Fun
description: Seal: WHAT the FUN is an omniverse multiplayer party royale game that allows up to 20 players to enjoy a range of compact plays in 10 minutes. Players can customize their characters with variety of effects and features, making the game more interactive and unpredictable.

name: Shogun Curse
description: Face demons and monsters while seeking revenge for the curse casted upon you. Will you find those responsible and finally lift it?

name: Elise
description: Awakened in a bunker amidst a zombie outbreak after a car crash, guide Elise through harrowing challenges, solve puzzles, and face relentless undead hordes and uncovering the bunker's dark secrets

name: Rogue Dimensions
description: An Old School 2d Platformer, twin stick shooter, arcade roguelite adventure. Destroy the crystals blocking your way to freedom and earn new abilities along the way while teleporting between random levels at will.

name: Heat Death: Survival Train
description: Heat Death is a sci-fi survival game where you can build, upgrade, and customize your battle train to explore and survive a frozen world! This train is not only your shelter and vehicle, but also your weapon and ally to face hostile drones, deadly storms, and hidden mysteries of an unknown world!

name: Garden Trills
description:
Explore floating gardens as Tomi, a tiny sparrow. Grow magical plants, meet other birds and get your wings dirty together to cultivate beautiful places for you to peacefully fly around and discover all their secrets.

Garden Trills is a cozy adventure game about exploring whimsical gardens and befriending a charming cast of tiny birds.

name: DemonCountdown
description: Demon Countdown is a Bullet Hell roguelike where hordes of Demons lurk in waves from hell, Kill all’em while sun is brightness… Every map is unique, and you can Play coop with your friends. Buy Skill boost Temporal! Will you be able to survive Before nightfall?

name: Botanical Chronicle
description: Discover a third-person adventure as a robot seeking the last traces of life! Technology morphed into nature! Explore, unravel secrets paths, and escape dark forces of this mysterious landscape. Rivers, rocks, bushes seamlessly merging into digital realm and try to stop you!

name: Creeper World IXE
description: The Creeper always returns... but this time, we have the advantage! Explore new worlds where the creeper, sand, and particles all merge in a pixel level simulation pushing the bounds of real time strategy into new territory.

name: Last Signal
description: On a mysterious journey through space, astronaut Adam 'Echo' Winters awakens in an abandoned station with amnesia. He must unravel the dark secrets of the station, where reality and illusion are intertwined. In the Last Signal, your choices will shape the fate of Echo and humanity.

name: Kaiju Princess 2
description: Journey across the galaxy with a cute kaiju and her ravenous appetite as you collect ingredients to cook up the ultimate feast!

name: Seeker: Quest
description: Build your ultimate team in this action-packed monster collector. Unlock dozens of playable characters, explore the planet of Naturia to obtain its loot and treasures! Engage into thrilling combat while building your village to obtain new heroes and powers for your expanding collection of Seekers.

name: Cat Needs
description: Cats are adorable beings but they can be temperamental, some like one thing and some like another. Find the purrfect way to organize the cats so that everyone is happy. Be careful for them don't fight each other.... or eat each other's food by mistake. ΦωΦ

name: Paw Paw Destiny
description:
A cosmic horror comedy, free humanity from the cursed ancient cosmic brainwashing.
Annihilate enemies with skills of dark humor surreally and become a guardian god of the world while traveling. An epic battle against UNCO, the global dominance organization, and the demon transcends dimensions!

name: The Spirit of the Samurai
description: A village in peril. A samurai reanimated. An Oni advancing. Fight an army of undead warriors and Japanese monsters as a human, a Kodama, and a cat in this 2D stop-motion action adventure.

name: Ink Inside
description: INK INSIDE is the hand drawn beat-em-up RPG with the heart of a Saturday Morning Cartoon! Play as Stick (Brian David Gilbert) an unfinished doodle in an old notebook trying to discover who they are. Fight back against the wet "Sog" corrupting the world while saving your friends in co-op!

name: Potion Wilds
description: Explore the wilds filled with curious creatures, delve into a mystery and grow fantastic plants as a tiny cat with a huge talent for potions in this 3D action adventure RPG.

name: Slap-It Together
description: Slap-It Together is a silly co-op game full of slapstick shenanigans and zany zombies. Put on a hat, pick-up a bat, and slap for survival in the greatest gameshow around!

name: Maki: Paw of Fury
description: Maki: Paw of Fury is a beautifully animated fighting game in the style of retro arcade gems. Use your martial arts skills to stun and defeat your opponents and kick the main villain’s ass!

name: Slap-It Together!
description: Set in a game show that only cares for the numbers; you and up to 3 online friends slap, throw and whack your way through hordes of enemies and hand-painted environments in this comedic zombie wave-based fighter.

name: Completely Stretchy
description: Stretch, swing and stick your way through the Grombi Isles! Use your stretchy arm and sticky fingers to explore vibrant regions, meet eccentric characters, and embark on quirky adventures. Oh, and you’re blue?

name: Iron Rebellion
description: Only for VR. Lock into the seat of a 40 ton mech and haul into battle with precise and fully interactive, physics based joysticks and cockpit controls. Deliver one devastating blow after another as you squad up with 4 friends and conquer your way across the solar system.

name: Planet Centauri
description: Embark on your greatest adventure to Planet Centauri! Explore hidden dungeons, capture and tame monsters, build and protect a NPC community, craft your own weapons and create your own magic spells! Develop and raise the Planet Centauri to the heavens as the cradle of a new civilization!

name: Marshmallow Marvin
description: Marshmallow Marvin is a 2D platformer where you must reach the end of the level.

name: Frozen Gauntlet
description: Frozen Gauntlet is a unique platformer game where you play as Zen, an adventurer with a magical gauntlet that can freeze creatures, helping him find his way back home.

name: The Maze Survivor: First Entrants
description: The Maze Survivor: First Entrants is a free online survival horror game that supports 1-4 players. You lost your memory and woke up in the center of a maze! The maze is full of monsters and traps. Find a way out of the maze through exploration, puzzle solving and cooperation!

name: Burrow Wing
description:
You wake up, feeling a bit hollow – and stumble down a hole. Now you're stuck here. Burrow Wing is an atmospheric exploration/adventure game about getting lost in a desolate subterranean expanse.

In a tightly packed hand-crafted map with two square kilometers of vertically interconnected sprawling caverns filled with branching paths to explore at your leisure, as well as over fifteen smaller areas accessible from the main map - each meticulously crafted and filled with collectables, enemies and quests.

name: Hajwala 2
description: HAJWALA 2 amps up high-speed drift racing in vast Gulf-inspired open worlds. With realistic car physics, stunning graphics, and new third-person characters, players can race, drift, and explore with total freedom. Experience the thrill of HAJWALA like never before.

name: Inn Hand
description: Inn Hand is an atmospheric god game and casual management sim that places you in the role of a magical deity operating a cozy isometric inn. Replace your mouse cursor with a spectral hand to tend to your patrons' needs in exchange for gold and reviews, ensuring your inn thrives!

name: My Lovely Cat: Remastered
description: Get ready for a purrfectly sweet romance set in a cat café!

name: Monster Hunter Now: Season 4
description: Sin descripción
